examples.korean: They swore their loyalty to the king. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 왕에 대한 충성을 맹세했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They swore their loyalty to the king. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Barons had to swear an oath of allegiance to the king. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 귀족들은 왕에게 충성할 것을 맹세해야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Barons had to swear an oath of allegiance to the king. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They were accused of conspiring against the king. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 왕에 대항할 음모를 꾸몄다는 혐의를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were accused of conspiring against the king. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Shorn of his power, the deposed king went into exile. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 권력을 빼앗기고 폐위된 그 왕은 망명을 떠났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Shorn of his power, the deposed king went into exile. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A fanfare signalled the entrance of the king. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 팡파르가 왕의 입장을 알렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
